title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 186.4 - Facing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 186.4 - Facing

State Regulations

The facing of an open or closed package with the largest, highest-colored and best quality apples in the package is not permitted. It is
required that the face or shown surface of the package shall be an average of
the contents as to size, color and freedom from defects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
186.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
